title: Modern Portfolio Template
description: A sleek, responsive portfolio template designed for creative professionals. Features include animated project galleries, dark/light mode toggle, contact form with validation, and CMS integration capabilities. Built with Next.js for optimal performance and SEO benefits, with Tailwind CSS for rapid styling. Includes 5 pre-designed page layouts, portfolio item templates, and responsive navigation that adapts to all devices. Perfect for designers, photographers, and developers looking to showcase their work professionally.
features: 5 pre-designed page layouts (Home, Projects, About, Contact, Blog)
Dark/light mode toggle with localStorage persistence
Contact form with reCAPTCHA and email.js integration
Responsive navigation with mobile hamburger menu

reviews.comment: Absolutely love this template! The animations are smooth and it was super easy to customize for my photography portfolio.
Great starter template, though I wish the documentation was a bit more detailed for beginners.
Worth every penny! My clients have been impressed with how professional my site looks now.

title: Landing Page Startup
description: High-conversion landing page template specifically designed for startups and SaaS businesses. Includes features like sticky navigation, animated statistics counters, testimonial carousels, and a feature comparison table. The template comes with built-in lead capture forms, newsletter integration, and social proof sections. Built with Bootstrap 5 for maximum compatibility and includes 3 different color schemes. Mobile-optimized with attention to loading speed and conversion rate optimization best practices.
features: Animated statistics counters with Intersection Observer
Pricing table with toggle between monthly/annual plans
Social proof section with client logos

reviews.comment: Our conversion rate increased by 30% after using this template! The built-in analytics points were super helpful.
Good template overall, but the mobile version could use some improvements in the form section.
The clean code and well-organized files made customization a breeze. Saved us weeks of development time!

title: E-Commerce UI Kit
description: Complete e-commerce interface package with 50+ customizable components including product cards, category filters, shopping cart flows, and checkout processes. Features a modern design system with micro-interactions for enhanced user experience. Includes product quick-view modals, size/color selectors, inventory indicators, and customer review sections. Built with React for dynamic functionality and SCSS for flexible styling. Comes with 3 complete page templates (homepage, category page, product detail) and integration guides for popular e-commerce platforms.
features: Product quick-view modal with image zoom
Inventory level indicators (In stock/Low stock/Out of stock)
Shopping cart drawer with promo code support

reviews.comment: This UI kit transformed our online store! Customers love the smooth shopping experience and the AR preview is a game-changer.
The component architecture is so well thought out. It saved us countless hours of development time.
Took some time to learn all the components but now that I have, I can't imagine building an e-commerce site without it.

title: Minimal Blog Template
description: Elegant, content-focused blog template with typography-first design principles. Features include article layouts with syntax highlighting for code snippets, newsletter subscription module, author bio sections, and related posts recommendations. Built with Jekyll for static site generation and Markdown support for easy content creation. Includes dark/light theme, responsive image handling, and performance-optimized assets. Perfect for technical writers, journalists, and content creators who value readability and clean aesthetics.
features: Author profile cards with social links
Related posts algorithm based on tags
Dark/light theme with system preference detection

reviews.comment: Perfect for my technical blog! The code highlighting and table of contents generation are lifesavers.
Love the minimalist design that puts content first. My readers have commented how much better the reading experience is.
Had some issues setting up the Jekyll environment initially, but once running it's been flawless.

title: Admin Dashboard Template
description: Comprehensive admin dashboard with 30+ widget components, data visualization charts, and CRUD interfaces. Features include role-based access control templates, notification systems, user management screens, and form validation patterns. Built with Vue.js and Vuetify for material design consistency. Includes 10 pre-built page templates (analytics, user profiles, settings, etc.), dark/light modes, and internationalization support. Comes with detailed documentation on integrating with REST APIs and backend systems.

reviews.comment: Replaced our custom-built admin panel with this and couldn't be happier. The RBAC system works perfectly for our needs.
The API integration documentation saved me so much time. Everything worked exactly as described.
Great template overall, though I wish the dark mode had more customization options.

title: SaaS Landing Template
description: Conversion-optimized landing template for SaaS products with feature highlights, pricing comparison tables, and customer testimonials. Includes interactive demo request forms, live chat UI components, and feature tour animations. Built with Gatsby for blazing fast performance and GraphQL for flexible data sourcing. Features a modular design system allowing easy rearrangement of sections, with 5 pre-designed color schemes. Includes integration examples for popular analytics and marketing tools.
features: Live chat UI with mock message flow

reviews.comment: Our conversion rates improved dramatically after implementing this template. The modular sections made testing different layouts easy.
The built-in analytics integrations saved us so much setup time. The documentation for adding Hotjar was particularly helpful.
Love the design system, though some of the GraphQL queries took time to understand for a beginner like me.

title: Neural OS Interface
description: Cutting-edge interface for neural network operating systems featuring real-time neural activity visualization, model training dashboards, and dataset management tools. Includes interactive node editors for architecture design, training progress monitors, and hyperparameter tuning interfaces. Built with Python backend integration points and PyTorch-compatible visualization components. Features dark mode optimized for prolonged usage, with accessibility considerations for research environments. Comes with documentation on integrating with popular ML frameworks and deployment pipelines.

reviews.comment: This interface has transformed how we visualize and understand our neural networks. The real-time heatmaps are revolutionary!
The hyperparameter tuning interface alone is worth the price. It's saved me countless hours of manual configuration.
Took some time to integrate with our custom models but the documentation was thorough and the support team was responsive.

title: Smart Assistant UI
description: Voice and text-based smart assistant interface with conversational UI components, intent visualization, and context-aware interaction flows. Features include multi-modal input handling (voice, text, touch), conversation history management, and plugin architecture for skill integration. Built with TensorFlow.js for client-side AI capabilities and real-time speech visualization. Includes 5 pre-designed theme variants and accessibility features for inclusive design. Comes with documentation for connecting to popular NLP APIs and extending functionality.

reviews.comment: The multi-modal input handling is incredibly smooth. Our users love being able to switch between voice and text seamlessly.
The accessibility features are some of the best I've seen in an AI interface. The high contrast mode works perfectly.
Great foundation, though I wish there were more examples of custom skill development in the documentation.

title: AI UX Dashboard
description: Comprehensive dashboard for monitoring and interacting with AI systems, featuring model performance metrics, data drift detection, and prediction analysis tools. Includes explainable AI components for model interpretability, confidence level visualizations, and feedback collection mechanisms. Built with TypeScript for type safety and Next.js for server-side rendering capabilities. Features real-time data streaming interfaces, alert systems, and team collaboration tools. Designed for both technical and non-technical users with role-specific views.

reviews.comment: This dashboard has become essential for our ML operations. The data drift detection has saved us multiple times from deploying problematic models.
Finally a dashboard that both our data scientists and business stakeholders can use effectively! The role-based views are perfect.
The TypeScript implementation is clean and well-documented. Made it easy to extend for our specific needs.

title: VoiceOS Layout Kit
description: Multi-platform voice operating system interface components for building conversational applications. Includes voice waveform visualizers, intent confirmation dialogs, and multi-step flow templates. Features accessibility-focused design with screen reader compatibility and visual voice feedback elements. Built with Flutter for cross-platform consistency and Firebase integration for real-time data sync. Comes with 8 pre-designed conversation patterns and documentation for voice API integration. Includes testing tools for voice interaction prototyping.

reviews.comment: The cross-platform consistency is amazing. We deployed the same voice interface to iOS, Android and web with minimal adjustments.
One of the few voice interfaces I've seen that truly considers screen reader users. The compatibility testing tools are excellent.
The conversation patterns saved us months of UX research. We were able to prototype and test different flows incredibly quickly.

title: Artificial Agent Template
description: Modular interface framework for building artificial agent applications with personality customization and multi-channel interaction capabilities. Features include emotion state visualization, memory recall interfaces, and task management systems. Built with Go for high-performance backend integration and gRPC for efficient microservice communication. Includes 5 distinct personality profiles with matching visual styles and interaction patterns. Comes with simulation tools for testing agent behavior and documentation for connecting to knowledge bases.

reviews.comment: The personality customization is incredibly powerful. We've created distinct agent personalities for different customer segments with ease.
The gRPC implementation is clean and performant. Handled our high-volume agent interactions without breaking a sweat.
The emotion visualization helps users understand the agent's state better, though some users found it distracting at times.

title: AI Agents UI
description: Foundation UI kit for AI-powered operating systems featuring adaptive interfaces, context-aware components, and learning feedback loops. Includes skill marketplace templates, permission management, and cross-AI collaboration tools. Built with Python for machine learning integration and TensorFlow for model serving interfaces. Features progressive disclosure patterns for complex functionality and onboarding flows for new users. Comes with 3 complete application templates (productivity assistant, smart home controller, research collaborator) and style guide for extension.

reviews.comment: The adaptive interface framework is revolutionary. Our system now adjusts seamlessly to different user needs and contexts.
The TensorFlow integration made serving our models through the UI incredibly straightforward. Saved us weeks of work.
Great foundation, though some of the more advanced features had a steeper learning curve than expected.
